50198.summary: Some customers in the Rossmere and Richmond West area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50198.title: Jun 1 - Winnipeg (Rossmere and Richmond West) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
